issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Fix inconsistent API in LogicalPlanBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8243](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8243). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
LogicalPlanBuilder project method takes a &Vec whereas other methods take a Vec. It makes sense to take Vec and take ownership of these inputs since they are being used to build the plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8243?focusedCommentId=17069025) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6741
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6741>
